name: anabss7p1
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
comment: A deduction unionizing a non-unionized collection of virtual hypotheses. This would have been named uun221 if the 0th permutation did not exist in set.mm as ~ anabss7 . (Contributed by Alan Sare, 4-Feb-2017.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
